contentfulProjectEntry.title: Preparing List of Beneficiaries and Ration Details

childMarkdownRemark.html:
List of Benefeciaries

Chitral has 7 districts with a population of almost half million.

From the survey conducted by our lead, following is the count of the most needy, that are a mix of daily wage labourers, disabled and aged.

  1. District Arandu has 60 needy
  2. District Daroosh has 80 needy
  3. District Chitral city has 100 needy
  4. District Garam Chashma has 60 needy
  5. District Morkho has 120 needy
  6. District Torkho has 80 needy
  7. District Mastooch has 100 needy

Count of families in extreme need are 600

Doer is اللہ ﷻ; that has blessed us to become the source of means for them. Will see how many we can manage.

Following is a sample of the list of beneficieries. Details are blurred-out but it gives an idea that details are in process of being captured.

Several of those beneficiaries are widows; old age; disabled.
